channel.title: A few questions of a noob
channel.description:
Hi all, I am running a server off of the cheezscape source code, and i have some questions:
1) How do i change what levels EVERYONE starts at
2) How do i change what items EVERYONE starts with
3) How do i add the pickup command? there is no command for it that i am aware of - even if you are a level 3 admin
Thanks alot,
Steve[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 06:40:21 AM[/size][hr]Oh, and how do i make it so EVERYONE can use the pickup command (when it's been made)
cheers,
steve
